Dear {!Session__c.Content_Owner__c},
The content review call for {!Session__c.Related_Account__c} is scheduled for {!Session__c.Content_Review_Call_date__c}. Please upload the content regarding {!Session__c.Name} and change the presentation status to "Ready for approval".
Click here to see how to upload the content in sCRM.
Thank you,
